title: FlowFix Labs Website
short: Modern company website with GitHub Pages deployment
description: Professional company website for FlowFix Labs featuring modern design, responsive layout, and automated deployment pipeline. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, deployed via GitHub Pages with custom domain configuration.
impact: Professional web presence for FlowFix Labs company
Automated deployment pipeline with GitHub Actions
Mobile-responsive design with modern UI/UX
SEO optimized for business visibility

title: JobFinderAI
short: AI-powered job application automation system with bulletproof reliability
description: A comprehensive job application automation system that combines AI-powered job discovery with bulletproof application submission. Features include automatic job finding across 15+ major platforms, smart form filling, AI cover letter generation, and robust error recovery with 100% success rate.
impact: 100% application success rate with zero failures
10x faster than manual applications (23-30 seconds per application)
Supports 15+ major ATS platforms including Lever, Greenhouse, Workday
Automated cookie consent handling for 20+ patterns

title: Proteome-AAC-Analysis
short: Advanced proteome analysis using amino acid composition methods
description: Comprehensive proteome analysis project focusing on amino acid composition (AAC) analysis for protein classification and functional prediction. Features advanced bioinformatics algorithms, statistical analysis, and machine learning approaches for proteome characterization.
impact: Developed novel AAC-based protein classification methods
Analyzed proteomes from multiple species
Implemented machine learning models for functional prediction
Contributed to computational biology research

title: Dr. Miller Lab - Viral Mutation Prediction
short: ML pipeline for viral protein mutation analysis and prediction
description: Advanced machine learning research project conducted at Loyola University's Dr. Miller Lab. Focuses on predicting viral protein mutations using deep learning models including VAE, RNN, and LSTM architectures for understanding viral evolution patterns.
impact: Developed novel ML approaches for viral mutation prediction
Mentored undergraduate students in bioinformatics methodologies
Improved prediction accuracy by 25% over baseline models
Integrated with HPC clusters for large-scale analysis

title: Automated Dataset Explorer
short: ML-powered data analysis tool with automated insights and SHAP visualizations
description: Advanced data exploration platform that automatically analyzes datasets, generates insights, and provides interactive visualizations. Features automated feature engineering, statistical analysis, correlation detection, and SHAP-based model interpretability for comprehensive data understanding.
impact: Automated 90% of exploratory data analysis workflows
Reduced data analysis time from hours to minutes
Scalable cloud architecture supporting business growth
Real-time analytics and monitoring dashboards

title: BTCAI - Bitcoin Price Prediction
short: Advanced ML system for cryptocurrency price prediction using time series analysis
description: Sophisticated machine learning system for Bitcoin price prediction using advanced time series analysis, technical indicators, and ensemble methods. Features real-time data processing, multiple prediction models, and comprehensive backtesting framework.
impact: Achieved 78% prediction accuracy on 24-hour price movements
Processed real-time market data from multiple exchanges
Implemented ensemble of LSTM, ARIMA, and Random Forest models
Backtested strategies across 3+ years of historical data
